verses.verse: <WG1492> For We Know <WG1063> That <WG3754> If <WG1437> <WG3588> Earthly <WG1919> Our <WG2257> House <WG3614> Of The <WG3588> Tabernacle <WG4636> Be Destroyed, <WG2647> A Building <WG3619> From <WG1537> God <WG2316> We Have, <WG2192> A House <WG3614> Not Made With Hands, <WG886> Eternal <WG166> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Heavens. <WG3772>

<WG2532> For Indeed <WG1063> In <WG1722> This <WG5129> We Groan, <WG4727> <WG3588> <WG3613> Our Dwelling <WG2257> Which Is <WG3588> From <WG1537> Heaven <WG3772> To Be Clothed With <WG1902> Longing; <WG1971>
If Indeed <WG1489> Also <WG2532> Being Clothed, <WG1746> Not <WG3756> Naked <WG1131> We Shall Be Found. <WG2147>

<WG2532> For Indeed <WG1063> Who <WG3588> Are <WG5607> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Tabernacle <WG4636> We Groan <WG4727> Being Burdened; <WG916> Since <WG1894> Not <WG3756> We Do Wish <WG2309> To Be Unclothed, <WG1562> ' But <WG235> To Be Clothed Upon, <WG1902> That <WG2443> May Be Swallowed Up <WG2666> The <WG3588> Mortal <WG2349> By <WG5259> <WG3588> Life. <WG2222>

<WG3588> Now He Who <WG1161> Wrought Out <WG2716> Us <WG2248> For <WG1519> <WG846> This Same Thing Is <WG5124> God, <WG2316> Who <WG3588> Also <WG2532> Gave <WG1325> To Us <WG2254> The <WG3588> Earnest <WG728> Of The <WG3588> Spirit. <WG4151>

Being Confident <WG2292> Therefore <WG3767> Always, <WG3842> And <WG2532> Knowing <WG1492> That <WG3754> Being At Home <WG1736> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Body <WG4983> We Are From Home <WG1553> Away From <WG575> The <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962>
<WG1223> <WG4102> For By Faith <WG1063> We Walk, <WG4043> Not <WG3756> By <WG1223> Sight; <WG1491>

<WG2292> We Are Confident, <WG1161> And <WG2532> Be Pleased <WG2106> Rather <WG3123> To Be From Home <WG1553> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Body <WG4983> And <WG2532> To Be At Home <WG1736> With <WG4314> The <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>
Wherefore <WG1352> Also <WG2532> We Are Ambitious, <WG5389> Whether <WG1535> Being At Home <WG1736> Or <WG1535> Being From Home, <WG1553> Well Pleasing <WG2101> To Him <WG846> To Be. <WG1511>

<WG3588> <WG1063> For All <WG3956> We <WG2248> Be Manifested <WG5319> Must <WG1163> Before <WG1715> The <WG3588> Judgment Seat <WG968> Of The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547> That <WG2443> May Receive <WG2865> Each <WG1538> The Things Done <WG3588> In <WG1223> The <WG3588> Body, <WG4983> According To <WG4314> What <WG3739> He Did, <WG4238> Whether <WG1535> Good <WG18> Or <WG1535> Evil. <WG2556>

Knowing <WG1492> Therefore <WG3767> The <WG3588> Terror <WG5401> Of The <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> Men <WG444> We Persuade, <WG3982> <WG2316> But To God <WG1161> We Have Been Manifested, <WG5319> <WG1679> And I Hope <WG1161> Also <WG2532> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4893> Your Consciences <WG5216> To Have Been Manifested. <WG5319>

<WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Again <WG3825> Ourselves <WG1438> Do We Command <WG4921> To You, <WG5213> But <WG235> Occasion <WG874> Are Giving <WG1325> To You <WG5213> Of Boasting <WG2745> In Behalf Of <WG5228> Us, <WG2257> That <WG2443> Ye May Have Such <WG2192> Towards <WG4314> Those <WG3588> In <WG1722> Appearance <WG4383> Boasting <WG2744> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> In Heart. <WG2588>
<WG1535> For Whether <WG1063> We Were Beside Ourselves, <WG1839> It Was To God; <WG2316> Or <WG1535> Are Sober Minded It Is <WG4993> For You. <WG5213>

<WG3588> For The <WG1063> Love <WG26> If The <WG3588> Christ <WG5547> Constrains <WG4912> Us, <WG2248> Having Judged <WG2919> This, <WG5124> That <WG3754> If <WG1487> One <WG1520> For <WG5228> All <WG3956> Died, <WG599> Then <WG686> <WG3588> All <WG3956> Died; <WG599>

And <WG2532> For <WG5228> All <WG3956> He Died, <WG599> That <WG2443> They Who <WG3588> Live <WG2198> No Longer <WG3371> To Themselves <WG1438> Should Live, <WG2198> But <WG235> To Him Who <WG3588> For <WG5228> Them <WG846> Died <WG599> And <WG2532> Was Raised Again. <WG1453>

So That <WG5620> We <WG2249> From <WG575> <WG3588> Now <WG3568> No One <WG3762> Know <WG1492> According To <WG2596> Flesh; <WG4561> <WG1487> But If <WG1161> Even <WG2532> We Have Known <WG1097> According To <WG2596> Flesh <WG4561> Christ, <WG5547> Yet <WG235> Now <WG3568> No Longer <WG3765> We Know Him. <WG1097>

So That <WG5620> If <WG1487> Anyone Be <WG5100> In <WG1722> Christ There Is <WG5547> A New <WG2537> Creation : <WG2937> The <WG3588> Old Things <WG744> Passed Away; <WG3928> , Lo, <WG2400> Have Become <WG1096> New <WG2537> <WG3588> All Things : <WG3956>

<WG3588> <WG1161> And All Things Are <WG3956> Of <WG1537> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> Who <WG3588> Reconciled <WG2644> Us <WG2248> To Himself <WG1438> By <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> And <WG2532> Gave <WG1325> To Us <WG2254> The <WG3588> Service <WG1248> <WG3588> Of Reconciliation : <WG2643>

How <WG5613> That <WG3754> God <WG2316> Was <WG2258> In <WG1722> Christ The <WG5547> World <WG2889> Reconciling <WG2644> To Himself, <WG1438> Not <WG3361> Reckoning <WG3049> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> <WG3900> Their Offences, <WG846> And <WG2532> Having Put <WG5087> In <WG1722> Us <WG2254> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> <WG3588> Of Reconciliation. <WG2643>

For <WG5228> Christ <WG5547> Therefore <WG3767> We Are Ambassadors, <WG4243> As It Were <WG5613> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Exhorting <WG3870> ' By <WG1223> Us, <WG2257> We Beseech <WG1189> For <WG5228> Christ, <WG5547> Be Reconciled <WG2644> <WG3588> To God. <WG2316>

<WG3588> For Him Who <WG1063> <WG3361> Knew Not <WG1097> Sin <WG266> For <WG5228> Us <WG2257> Sin <WG266> He Made, <WG4160> That <WG2443> We <WG2249> Might Become <WG1096> Righteousness <WG1343> Of God <WG2316> In <WG1722> Him. <WG846>
